data.what_is:
Magnews is the one-stop-shop solution for managing Customer Journey and improving Customer Value, from overall Strategy definition to single activities and campaign Execution, passing from Journey Design, in a continuous cycle of measurement and improvment. 
Magnews empowers marketing and sales teams to work together to acquire, convert, grow, engage and reactivate Customers and incrementing their value for the Brand.
data.product_description: MagNews is the software, full-service and strategy for your Email Marketing campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_title: Innovazione e fattore umano per una piattaforma intuitiva e performante
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
Facilita d'uso
Efficacia
Supporto "umano"
Soluzioni messe a disposizione
Performance

What do you dislike about Magnews?
Non ci sono particolari elementi di insoddisfazione

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
Attraverso MagNews stiamo mantenendo il dialogo con la nostra base utente in modo efficace, semplice e intuitivo e sempe aggiornato con le soluzioni piu innovative

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer:
Facilita d'uso
Efficacia
Supporto "umano"
Soluzioni messe a disposizione
Performance

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer: Non ci sono particolari elementi di insoddisfazione

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Attraverso MagNews stiamo mantenendo il dialogo con la nostra base utente in modo efficace, semplice e intuitivo e sempe aggiornato con le soluzioni piu innovative

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
* Completezza dello strumento nel quadro generale dei competitors
* Grande affidabilita e velocita in uscita delle comunicazioni
* Team di supporto qualificato e pronto a dare seguito ad ogni domanda
* Gestione granulare dei privilegi / accessi degli utenti
* Curva di apprendimento agevole
* Capacita di offrire soluzioni custom del team di sviluppo
* Supporto commerciale dedicato e reattivo
* Features di marketing automation
* Modulo Tracking Email Simply SMTP incluso
* Cicli formativi da parte dell'azienda per i partners

What do you dislike about Magnews?
Fino a qualche tempo fa la user interface poteva risultare un po' datata, tuttavia con l'introduzione di Matilda la nuova esperienza e certamente piu fluida e i dati essenziali sono subito disponibili nella dashboard iniziale in maniera chiara e immediata.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
* Affidabilita e rapidita nell'invio
* Webservices di semplice gestione
* L'automation permette di scaricare il lavoro di routine
* L'Help Desk eccellente permette di trovare soluzioni ai problemi in maniera rapida

initial_reviews.review_title: Completa ma facile, potente ma intuitiva. Finalizzata alle conversioni e alla concretezza
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
Non e solo una piattaforma di email marketing. E' molto di piu. E' uno strumento di analisi del bisogno, di definizione di obiettivi (conversioni) e di implementazione pratica di azioni necessarie per raggiungere nel concreto questi obiettivi. Il tutto in multicanalita, unendo piu strumenti. Email ma non solo. WhatsApp, SMS, Survey, Marketing Automation, Web Tracking, Web Experience.
In tutto in modo estremanente funzionale e nel rispetto del GDPR,

What do you dislike about Magnews?
La piattaforma puo fare anche cose molto complesse e questo si traduce in una pluralita di pulsanti e tasti. Lo strumento risulta tuttavia faciele  gradevole nelli'utilizzo, anche se bisogna avere consapevolezza su cio che si realizza e si fa.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
Fidelizzazione del clienti e soprattutto Lead Generation

initial_reviews.review_title: Potente piattaforma con un ottimo rapporto qualita prezzo
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
E' una piattaforma completa, in grado di deliverare contenuti su diversi canali, con diverse funzionalita interessanti da provare. Negli anni il team si e dimostrato disponibile anche ad effettuare modifiche custom in base alle nostre necessita. Per la nostra esperienza, anche il supporto clienti si e sempre rivelato pronto ed efficace nelle risposte e negli interventi.

What do you dislike about Magnews?
Di recente e stata rilasciata la nuova versione dell'interfaccia, che dovrebbe colmare alcune lacune rispetto alla versione precedente. Il CMS potrebbe essere leggermente rivisto, a mio parere

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
Abbiamo utilizzato MagNews negli anni prettamente per l'invio di newsletter e come servizio SMTP, da poco lo stiamo testando per le altre funzionalita (come marketing automation,

Per la nostra esperienza, anche il supporto clienti si e sempre rivelato pronto ed efficace nelle risposte e negli interventi.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great software and a reliable partner.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
Overall functionality, allowing full digital marketing automation. The Magnews is a reliable partner for us, quick to reply to support and general questions.

What do you dislike about Magnews?
Some support documents are available only in Italian. Our contact person always does his best to compensate for this.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
E-mail marketing & marketing automation for our clients, some of which use Magnews as in integrated tool embedded in our services. This allows us to deliver a one-stop solution to our clients, and to give them support on the digital aspects of their communication.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer: Overall functionality, allowing full digital marketing automation. The Magnews is a reliable partner for us, quick to reply to support and general questions.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer: Some support documents are available only in Italian. Our contact person always does his best to compensate for this.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: E-mail marketing & marketing automation for our clients, some of which use Magnews as in integrated tool embedded in our services. This allows us to deliver a one-stop solution to our clients, and to give them support on the digital aspects of their communication.

initial_reviews.review_title: A powerful platform, now more user friendly with the new UI
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
Many features, allowing the implementation of various, complex marketing scenario

Excellent deliverability of Email (fast and reliable)

Excellent Customer Support

Improved usability with the brand new interface

What do you dislike about Magnews?
Learning curve not so fast, due to many functionalities

Not all features are available under the new UI (currently) so some switch between new and old is needed

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automating main customer communication processes for ecommerce

Driving user to conversion / Purchase

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer:

Excellent Customer Support

Improved usability with the brand new interface

review_question_answers.answer:
Learning curve not so fast, due to many functionalities

Not all features are available under the new UI (currently) so some switch between new and old is needed

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Automating main customer communication processes for ecommerce

Driving user to conversion / Purchase

initial_reviews.review_title: A powerful platform and a very professional support!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
Magnews is a complete and powerful software which improved our possibilities and strategies related to the customer experience with our products. The support team was the key in our experiences: not only the software, but also the specialists behind.

What do you dislike about Magnews?
It's a structured software, therefore our team should take the time learning how to use and "translate" our past strategies. The new platform interface helped a lot.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
We implemented better marketing strategies thanks to Magnews,  we also start using funnels and automation, to provide a personalized conversation with our users. A step-change for us!

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer: Magnews is a complete and powerful software which improved our possibilities and strategies related to the customer experience with our products. The support team was the key in our experiences: not only the software, but also the specialists behind.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer: It's a structured software, therefore our team should take the time learning how to use and "translate" our past strategies. The new platform interface helped a lot.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We implemented better marketing strategies thanks to Magnews,  we also start using funnels and automation, to provide a personalized conversation with our users. A step-change for us!

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
Easy database management, tool flexibility and integration with e-commerce platforms.

What do you dislike about Magnews?
The use of the tool is not intuitive in its most advanced functions, but the new graphic design has greatly improved this aspect.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
Magnews makes it easy to manage the e-mail marketing plan, providing many possibilities for customizing audience segments.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer: Easy database management, tool flexibility and integration with e-commerce platforms.

review_question_answers.answer: Magnews makes it easy to manage the e-mail marketing plan, providing many possibilities for customizing audience segments.

I like the attention to technical details, the ease of use of the new interface.

What do you dislike about Magnews?
Beautiful things are expensive :). Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
We produce a huge number of emails. We need a very high delivery rate

interface could be prettier but the new matilda is going to the right direction

initial_reviews.review_title: Un tool completo, versatile e adatto per ogni tipologia di business
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
La rapidita di apprendimento, le funzioni di automation e journey builder ed il supporto sempre disponibile

What do you dislike about Magnews?
Le precedenti versioni non erano il massimo a livello di UX/UI, ma gli ultimi aggiornamenti hanno sicuramente colmato questo gap

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sicuramente ha velocizzato e standardizzato la nostra attivita di mailing ed invio newsletter. Le journey automation hanno poi scaricato il team operativo di alcune attivita ridondanti che ci ha reso piu produttivi.

Automazione di tutti i processi di comunicazione della mia Azienda

initial_reviews.review_title: Reliable but not user friendly as his big competitors
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
A really smart and young company situated just 40 km from us. Reliable business partner. Excellent helpdesk.

What do you dislike about Magnews?
High price, not very easy to use, slower than competitors in innovation, interface not so nice as big competitors, poor templates.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reliable email marketing platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer: A really smart and young company situated just 40 km from us. Reliable business partner. Excellent helpdesk.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Magnews?
review_question_answers.answer: High price, not very easy to use, slower than competitors in innovation, interface not so nice as big competitors, poor templates.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Reliable email marketing platform.

all_reviews.review_title: Great software and a reliable partner.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
Overall functionality, allowing full digital marketing automation. The Magnews is a reliable partner for us, quick to reply to support and general questions.

What do you dislike about Magnews?
Some support documents are available only in Italian. Our contact person always does his best to compensate for this.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
E-mail marketing & marketing automation for our clients, some of which use Magnews as in integrated tool embedded in our services. This allows us to deliver a one-stop solution to our clients, and to give them support on the digital aspects of their communication.

Excellent deliverability of Email (fast and reliable)

What do you dislike about Magnews?

Automating main customer communication processes for ecommerce

Driving user to conversion / Purchase

all_reviews.review_title: A powerful platform and a very professional support!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Magnews?
Magnews is a complete and powerful software which improved our possibilities and strategies related to the customer experience with our products. The support team was the key in our experiences: not only the software, but also the specialists behind.

What do you dislike about Magnews?
It's a structured software, therefore our team should take the time learning how to use and "translate" our past strategies. The new platform interface helped a lot.

What problems is Magnews solving and how is that benefiting you?
We implemented better marketing strategies thanks to Magnews,  we also start using funnels and automation, to provide a personalized conversation with our users. A step-change for us!
